layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x86
  LayoutBlockFlow {html} at (0,0) size 800x86
    LayoutBlockFlow {body} at (8,8) size 784x70
      LayoutTable {table} at (0,0) size 784x70 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection (anonymous) at (1,1) size 782x68
          LayoutTableRow {tr} at (0,2) size 782x64
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (2,2) size 388x64 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 384x59
                text run at (2,2) width 197: "This cell text should be justified "
                text run at (199,2) width 187: "which means that the right and"
                text run at (2,22) width 202: "left margins should line up, no "
                text run at (203,22) width 183: "matter how long the content"
                text run at (2,42) width 216: "becomes (except the last line which "
                text run at (218,42) width 131: "should be left aligned)"
            LayoutTableCell {td} at (392,22) size 388x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 209x19
                text run at (2,2) width 209: "This cell text should be left justified"
